participant_1.background:
I keep my social circle small.
While my parents are of an older generation, my music taste is contemporary and eclectic.
my children are a dissapointment.
i work as a trauma surgeon.
I've never been arrested, but I would love to travel the world and play music like my brother.

participant_2.background:
My weight is irrelevant.
i go fishing on the weekends to relax.
I practice martial arts regularly to stay in shape and defend myself.
i am twenty one years old.
i like to fish.

content.text: Hey! What are you up to today?
Not much, just got done practicing martial arts for a while, I'm pretty tired.
Oh cool, what kind of martial arts do you practice?
I mostly do Muay Thai and boxing, but I also do some jiu-jitsu and wrestling.
Wow, that sounds really intense! Do you compete in any tournaments?
I used to, but not anymore. I don't have as much time now that I'm working full time.
I hear you, work can be really demanding. What do you do for work?
I'm a trauma surgeon at the local hospital.
Oh wow, that's a really important job! Do you enjoy it?
I love it! It's really rewarding to be able to help people.
That's great to hear! Do you have any hobbies outside of work?
I love to go fishing, and I also play the guitar.
Fishing sounds really relaxing, and I've always wanted to learn how to play the guitar.
It is, and it's a great way to spend some time outdoors. And guitar is really fun to play, you should definitely give it a try!
I think I will, thanks for the suggestion
